data.name: R.A.V.E - Real-time Audio Visual Experience
data.detailed_description: R.A.V.E. - Real-time Audio Visual Experience, is an online multiplayer video game built for live electronic events. Experience an immersive world of virtual locations with your friends while listening to your favorite artists live. Choose your own character to explore these locations freely. Become lost in the visuals and lights controlled in real-time or even control them yourself. You can even build your own venues and create live events from the comfort of your home. R.A.V.E is being developed by 2 people with the insight of the electronic music community to help us create an amazing game.
data.about_the_game: R.A.V.E. - Real-time Audio Visual Experience, is an online multiplayer video game built for live electronic events. data.short_description: R.A.V.E. is an online multiplayer video game built for live electronic events.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
